songs.title: #Beautiful (West Coast Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Mariah Carey, (Young Jeezy)]
You and your mind is (the world)
Beautiful
And I can't pretend that that doesn't mean a thing to me yea yea
Your beautiful oh oh oh oh so beautiful oh (that's right)
And I can't pretend that that doesn't mean a thing to me (I can't pretend baby)

[Verse 1: Jeezy]
So raw steal attention your beautiful to me frank lucas julie the beauty and the G
All this wisdom in my eye God know this what ya see tell where you at I can tell you where to be
When I look into your eyes I see an angel in disguise
Got them Jimmy Choes on yea it's murder with them thighs Lusa Lean bag bet she keep cash in it
Whole thing in her hair bet she keep a jag in it
Girl your body that fit yea you shoulda been a killa
Body so dope yea you shoulda been a dealer
Got me high like dirty sprite methamphetamines
Bout to make a new song called nothin but her jeans
Beautiful, hang her on the wall like Mona Lisa
You really wana ball get Jezzy on the feature yea
I can't even lie made me a better man see my side chick another chick that gotta understand

[Mariah & Miguel:]
You’re beautiful, and your mind is fucking beautiful
And I can’t pretend that that doesn’t mean a thing to me, to me, yeah
You’re beautiful, good lord, you’re fucking beautiful
And I can’t pretend that that doesn’t mean a thing to me, to me, yeah, yeah

[Verse 2: Mariah Carey]
I like when you run red lights
Don’t stop ’til you thrill me, oh how you thrill me
Always in control, how you do it, I don’t know
But I don’t care, take me anywhere
‘Cause it’s beautiful, ooh you beautiful, you make me feel beautiful, you beautiful

[Mariah & Miguel:]
You’re beautiful, and your mind is fucking beautiful
And I can’t pretend that that doesn’t mean a thing to me, to me, yeah
You’re beautiful, good lord, you’re fucking beautiful
And I can’t pretend that that doesn’t mean a thing to me, to me, yeah, yeah

[Jeezy ad lib:]
So raw steal attention your beautiful to me
Tell me where you at I can tell you where to be
Girl your body that fit yea you shoulda been a killer
Body so dope yea you shoulda been a dealer
Body so dope yea you shoulda been a dealer
Your beautiful to me your beautiful to me your beautiful to me your beautiful to me
